name: Edible Red Cabbage Bowl
author: Kim in the Kitchen
summary: Quick impressive edible bowl, made from a red or green cabbage,  to hold your favorite dip. Perfect for any dip including vegetable dip, chip dip, or cheese dip. Serve with veggies for a festive holiday display.
directions: Peel any wilted or dry leaves from the cabbage
Cut the top 1/3 from the cabbage
Carefully slice the bottom of the cabbage, just enough so it doesn't roll around
(If you accidentally cut it crooked don't worry
It will sit on a slight angle as creative flare
) Cut most of the middle of the cabbage by cutting a little chunk at a time until a bowl is formed, leaving a 1/2-inch border for the sides of the bowl
